misc: Has been working on his mental game a lot
biography: Eero, the pride of Vuosaari Golf Helsinki, returns to the Hector Trophée for his eighth appearance in 2025. As Pasi's little brother, Eero has always had a lot to live up to, but he has undoubtedly carved his own path in the world of golf. Known for his calm demeanor and calculated approach to the game, Eero is a formidable opponent on the course.

While the coveted Hector Trophée has eluded him thus far, Eero has demonstrated his individual prowess by claiming the Victor Trophy once. Over the past several months, Eero has been working on strengthening his mental fortitude, which will likely prove invaluable as he navigates the pressures of the Hector Trophée.

Eero's dedication to continuous improvement is evident in his commitment to refining both his physical and mental game. He is a player to watch closely, as his unwavering focus and strategic brilliance make him a true contender.
